lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sunday about Villanova’s 78-76 victory over Pittsburgh in the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament misspelled the surname of the Pittsburgh player who missed a 70-foot shot at the buzzer. He is Levance Fields, not Field. Because of an editing error, the article also misstated the potential effect of the shot. It would have given Pittsburgh the victory; it would not have sent the game into overtime.
